Message:
The place Nebra and I
first met was a slum where
abandoned witches gathered.

Everyone was overwrought
with despair, except for her.

She smiled so happily,
just having her by my side
felt like a salve
to my wounded heart...

Many of the orphans relied
on that saintly girl’s smile,
but I was the one
they called, “Leader.”

I couldn’t afford to show any
hint of vulnerability or weakness.

When those thoughts pushed me
to keep my distance from Nebra,
she told me this...

“You don’t have to do
everything on your own.
I’m here, too.”

Back then, I ran away
out of embarrassment...

But, despite my shyness,
she’d always chase me down
to smile at my side.

Before I knew it,
having her there felt so natural,
that one day, I began to think...

I have to protect this smiling girl.
That is my true calling.

I’ll live and die
by your side, Nebra...
